ygData.subject: Re: Paladin Vs SK
ygData.msgSnippet: Fairly high level Paladins can take down an SK s pet with huge ease. If the Paladin is of a similar level to you, and even if you re givin the luxury of
ygData.messageBody:
Fairly high level Paladins can take down an SK's pet with huge ease. If the
Paladin is of a similar level to you, and even if you're givin the luxury of
summoning your pet before the battle, it would only take a Paladin a couple
of spells or some slashes to take down your low leveled pet. Sure, that would
give you time to beat up on them and have the upper hand for most of the
fight. But as i've found in dueling Paladins, when they get low they use lay
on hands and even if you immediatly rip off harm touch, they proceed to stay
on top of the fight, as your harmtouch doesnt match the amount of hps they
got back from lay on hands.
